Package frames.processing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GLMatrixHandler
    Internal MatrixHandler based on PGraphicsOpenGL graphics transformation.
    Java2DMatrixHandler
    Internal MatrixHandler based on PGraphicsJava2D graphics transformations.
    Scene
    A 2D or 3D interactive, on-screen or off-screen, Processing mouse-driven Graph.
    Shape
    A shape is a Frame specialization that should always be attached to a scene (see Frame.isAttached(Graph)) and that can be set from a retained-mode rendering Processing PShape or from an immediate-mode rendering Processing procedure.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Shape.Highlighting
